author: Debra Mendes
title: TOP Step Consulting Demonstrates Continued Growth With The Hiring Of Professional Services Automation Consultants
text:
TOP Step Consulting, a leading provider of professional services automation, project management, and consulting skills services has added six new consultants to its growing staff and currently at a 65% staff growth rate over 2014. Joining TOP Step Consulting are Amy McFadzean, Senior Business Consultant, and Shelby Ledbetter, Zachary Siegel and Diana Martin as Business Consultants. Each of these talented PSA professionals come to TOP Step Consulting with years of demonstrated experience in information technology systems.
“The demand for experienced PSA professionals has always fueled the growth of TOP Step Consulting. Our customers want implementation and management services that relieve the stress of PSA projects, not cause more,“ states Jodi Cicci, President and CEO. “That is why we recruit and hiring talent like Amy, Shelby, and Zachery. We can help more customers achieve successful PSA projects and manage the systems that enable them to deliver profitable services to their customers’.
This hiring announcement follows recent awards and recognition for the company. Last month TOP Step Consulting was recognized by Inc., which ranked it in the Inc. 5000 list of America’s Fastest Growing Private Companies. Earlier this year CIO Review placed TOP Step Consulting in a top spot on their annual list of the 20 Most Promising NetSuite Solution Providers. And for the sixth consecutive year, Service Performance Insight (SPI) ranked TOP Step Consulting as a top performing professional services organization and awarded it “Best-of-the-Best” status.

About TOP Step Consulting
TOP Step Consulting improves business efficiency and productivity for professional services business operations. TOP Step helps professional services organizations achieve their profitability goals allowing them to focus on building their business. The TOP Step team is comprised of consultants who have extensive experience in PS business operations, project management, and PS automation. They understand the challenges and rewards of managing an on-demand Professional Services Automation (PSA) system in multi-office and global business environments. TOP Step Consulting has served over 250 customers worldwide. TOP Step Consulting has continued to maintain a Best of the Best status with SPI Research six years running and was ranked as one of the fastest growing privately held companies by Inc 5000.
